property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only as your first [Click]. Look at the top 6 cards of your stack. You may trash any of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes in an instant you realize who your friends really are.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Once per turn, when you pay the trash cost of an accessed card, remove that card from the game instead of trashing it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Underestimate those people at your own peril." -Akshara Sareen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw 1 card. Gain 1[Credits] for each copy of Exclusive Party in your heap. Limit 6 per deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more parties she attended, the more they trusted her. The more they trusted her, the more entertaining her scams became.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1[Credits]: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice with exactly 1 subroutine. 1[Credits]: +1 strength. 2[Credits]: Swap Vamadeva with a deva program from your grip.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Preserver.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1[Credits]: Break up to 2 ice subroutines. 2[Credits]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice in which you used Brahman to break a subroutine ends, add 1 installed non-virus program to the top of your stack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. The first time you make a successful run on that server this turn, instead of accessing cards, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1[Link] [Trash]: Draw 3 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Check out my new ride." -2xTiger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you install a piece of hardware from your grip, you may install another copy of that hardware from your grip (paying all costs).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In these days of digital full-sim browsing and widely available nano-assembly, it takes a special kind of crazy person to go shopping in meatspace. There are millions of them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Runner searches his or her stack or installs a card from his or her heap, he or she must trash a card from his or her grip at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [haas-bioroid] cards in your deck. The first time you spend 3[Click] on the same action each turn, gain [Click].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Very good, sir."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [jinteki] cards in your deck. Once per turn, you may lose [Click] when you draw a card. If you do, reveal that card and a card in Archives of the same type, then swap those cards.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Psi

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[Credits], 1[Credits], or 2[Credits]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner loses 2[Credits]. [Subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on a piece of rezzed psi ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Connect two truths. Connect two programs. All is one."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever there is a successful trace, gain 1[Credits] and the Runner loses 1[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the world shrinks, communications becomes the most essential technology." -Ramesh Gupta, One World Economy

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Alliance-Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. Name a card. The Runner reveals his or her grip and trashes all copies of the named card from his or her grip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [weyland-consortium] cards in your deck. [Click]: Search R&D for an executive, sysop, or character, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you rez or play an out-of-faction card (including Indian Union Stock Exchange), gain 1[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wealth wisely invested is wealth earned." -The New Gospel of Wealth

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trash 1 program. [Subroutine] Do 2 net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The naja naja is the king of all serpents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search R&D for any number of copies of a card, reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's the exact same coffee, but the price sure is different.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card costs 0 influence if you have 7 or more assets in your deck. If the Runner accesses Mumbad Virtual Tour while it is installed, he or she must trash it, if able.
